name: node-telegram-bot-api
description: Node.js module to interact with official Telegram Bot API.

name: Telegram Bot API
description: The Bot API is an HTTP-based interface created for developers keen on building bots for Telegram.

name: telebot
description: A simple, but extensible Python implementation for the Telegram Bot API.

name: aiogram
description: aiogram is a pretty simple and fully asynchronous framework for Telegram Bot API written in Python 3.7 with asyncio and aiohttp. It helps you to make your bots faster and simpler.
